src.groovy.org.apache.ki.grails
Class RealmWrapper

java.lang.Object
  src.java.org.apache.ki.grails.RealmAdapter
      src.groovy.org.apache.ki.grails.RealmWrapper

class RealmWrapper
extends RealmAdapter

Simple implementation of the Ki Realm that wraps a 'Realm' artefact. It is basically an adapter between the Grails world and the Ki world.

author:
Peter Ledbrook
